name: wid1_F2F1_module3
label: F2F 1: zygosity questionnaire for cohorts 1 & 2 (CAPI)
description: This questionnaire module contains questions on: zygosity.

items.name: sex
items.text: Interviewer: Please record:
items.text_de: Interviewer: Bitte eintragen:

zyg0200t.question: zyg0200t
zyg0200t.name: zyg0200t
zyg0200t.label: How tall is the older twin [name] currently in cm?

items.name: zyg0200t
items.text: How tall is the older twin [name] currently in cm?
items.text_de: Wie gross ist der aeltere Zwilling [Name] gegenwaertig in cm?

Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. zyg0300.question: zyg0300
zyg0300.name: zyg0300
zyg0300.label: Are there differences in the colors of the twins' hair?

items.name: zyg0300
items.text: Are there differences in the colors of the twins' hair?
items.text_de: Gibt es Unterschiede bei der farblichen Schattierung der Haare der Zwillinge?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (for K3/K4)

Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (fuer K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 1: yes, there is a significant difference.
answers.label_de: 1: ja, es gibt einen deutlichen Unterschied

answers.label: 2: yes, there is a slight difference.
answers.label_de: 2: ja, es gibt einen leichten Unterschied

answers.label: 1: yes, there is a significant difference.

answers.label_de: 2: ja, es gibt einen leichten Unterschied

zyg0400.question: zyg0400
zyg0400.name: zyg0400
zyg0400.label: Did both twins get their first teeth at the same time?

items.name: zyg0400
items.text: Did both twins get their first teeth at the same time?
items.text_de: Haben die Zwillinge in etwa zur gleichen Zeit Zaehne bekommen?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (for K3/K4)
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (fuer K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 1: yes, both got the same teeth on the same side just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, die entsprechenden Zaehne auf derselben Seite sind bei beiden nur um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen.

answers.label: 2: yes, both got the same teeth but on different sides just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, die entspr. Zaehne sind um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen, auf entgegenges. Seiten

answers.label: 3: yes, both got different teeth just a few days apart.
answers.label_de: 3: Ja, verschiedene Zaehne sind nur um wenige Tage versetzt gekommen.

answers.label: 4: no, the twins got their teeth at quite different times.
answers.label_de: 4: Nein, die ersten Zaehne der Zwillinge kamen deutlich zeitversetzt.

zyg0500.name: zyg0500

zyg0700.question: zyg0700
zyg0700.name: zyg0700
zyg0700.label: What do you think: Are your twins monozygotic (identical) or dizygotic (non-identical)?

items.name: zyg0700
items.text: What do you think: Are your twins monozygotic (identical) or dizygotic (non-identical)?
items.text_de: Was glauben Sie persoenlich? Sind Ihre Zwillinge eineiig oder zweieiig?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. zyg0702.question: zyg0702
zyg0702.name: zyg0702
zyg0702.label: Did a medical professional (e.g., family doctor, nurse, physician) ever tell you your twins' zygosity?

items.name: zyg0702
items.text: Did a medical professional (e.g., family doctor, nurse, physician) ever tell you your twins' zygosity?
items.text_de: Wurde Ihnen jemals von medizinischem Personal (z.B. Hausarzt, Krankenschwester, Facharzt) die Eiigkeit Ihrer Zwillinge mitgeteilt?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (for K3/K4)
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (fuer K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 1: yes, we were told that they are identical.
answers.label_de: 1: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie eineiig sind.

answers.label: 2: yes, we were told that they are non-identical.
answers.label_de: 2: Ja, uns wurde mitgeteilt, dass sie zweieiig sind.

answers.label: 3: no, we were never given any such information.
answers.label_de: 3: Nein, darueber wurde uns nichts mitgeteilt.

zyg0800.question: zyg0800
zyg0800.name: zyg0800
zyg0800.label: When you look at early photographs of the twins when they were between 2 and 4, can you tell them apart without hints from clothing or other clues?

items.name: zyg0800
items.text: When you look at early photographs of the twins when they were between 2 and 4, can you tell them apart without hints from clothing or other clues?
items.text_de: Wenn Sie sich fruehe Fotos Ihrer Zwillinge im Alter von 2-4 Jahren anschauen, koennen Sie die beiden auseinanderhalten, ohne Merkmale der Kleidung oder andere Hinweise heranzuziehen?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (for K3/K4)
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (fuer K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 1: yes, I can keep them easily apart
answers.label_de: 1: ja, ich kann sie leicht auseinanderhalten

answers.label: 2: yes, but sometimes it is difficult
answers.label_de: 2: ja, aber manchmal ist es schwierig

answers.label: 3: no, I very often mistake them for one another on photos
answers.label_de: 3: nein, ich verwechsele sie sehr oft auf Fotos

zyg0801.name: zyg0801
zyg0801.label: Did people confuse the twins when they were very young?

zyg0808.question: zyg0808
zyg0808.name: zyg0808
zyg0808.label: Did people confuse the twins when they were together?

items.name: zyg0808
items.text: Did people confuse the twins when they were together?
items.text_de: Wurden die Zwillinge verwechselt, wenn sie zusammen waren?
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 4: no, they have never been mistaken for one another

zyg0809.question: zyg0809
zyg0809.name: zyg0809
zyg0809.label: Would you say that when the twins were very young, they...

items.name: zyg0809
items.text: Would you say that when the twins were very young, they...
items.text_de: Wuerden Sie sagen, dass Ihre Zwillinge im fruehen Kindesalter. . .
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (for K3/K4)
items.description_de: Source: Adaptiert von: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (fuer K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)

answers.label: 1: looked exactly the same
answers.label_de: 1: sich aeusserlich glichen, wie ein Ei dem anderen

answers.label: 2: had a strong resemblance, like siblings
answers.label_de: 2: sich aeusserlich so aehnlich waren, wie Geschwister es eben sind

answers.label: 3: had no resemblance at all
answers.label_de: 3: sich aeusserlich ueberhaupt nicht aehnlich waren

zyg0900.question: zyg0900
zyg0900.name: zyg0900
zyg0900.label: We are also interested in knowing if there are other twins in your family. Which generation and which side of your family are they on (mother's side/father's side)? Multiple answers are possible.

items.name: zyg0900
items.text: We are also interested in knowing if there are other twins in your family. Which generation and which side of your family are they on (mother's side/father's side)? Multiple answers are possible.
items.text_de: Wir sind auch daran interessiert, ob es in Ihrer Familie weitere Zwillingspaare gibt. In welcher Generation und in welchem Teil Ihrer Familie (muetterlicherseits/vaeterlicherseits) gab oder gibt es Zwillinge? Sie koennen mehrere Angaben machen.
items.description: Source: Adapted from: Goldsmith, H. H. (1991). A Zygosity Questionnaire for Young Twins: A Research Note. Behavior Genetics, 21 (3), 257-269 (for K1/K2); Onisczenko, W., Angleitner, A., Strelau, J., & Angert, T. (1993). The questionnaire of twins' physical resemblance. Unpublished Manuscript. University of Warsaw, Poland and University of Bielefeld, Germany (fuer K3/K4)
